# featureSettings

**Type Property**

The font feature settings attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
static let featureSettings: UIFontDescriptor.AttributeName
```

## Discussion

The value is an array of dictionaries that represents nondefault font feature settings. Each dictionary contains a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFontDescriptor/FeatureKey/type] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFontDescriptor/FeatureKey/selector] key.

## Constants

- **cascadeList**: The cascading list attribute.
- **characterSet**: The character set attribute.
- **face**: The font face attribute.
- **family**: The font family attribute.
- **fixedAdvance**: The glyph advancement attribute.
- **matrix**: The font’s transformation matrix attribute.
- **name**: The font name attribute.
- **size**: The font size attribute.
- **textStyle**: The text style attribute.
- **traits**: The font traits dictionary attribute.
- **visibleName**: The font’s visible name attribute.
title: featureSettings
